item.title: What we know about the suspect in UnitedHealthcare CEO's shooting death
item.description: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was shot and killed in New York City on Wednesday in what officials are calling a targeted attack.

item.title: Watch Live: UnitedHealthcare CEO killed in NYC shooting
item.description: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was killed in a shooting outside a hotel in Midtown Manhattan.

item.title: Listen Live: Supreme Court hears major transgender rights case
item.description: The Supreme Court is weighing whether Tennessee's ban on gender-affirming care for minors experiencing gender dysphoria violates the Constitution.

item.title: NATO chief calls for more weapons for Ukraine ahead of peace talks with Russia
item.description: NATO Secretary-General Mark Rutte is urging Ukraine to hold off on peace talks with Russia until it can get more military aid. CBS News senior nationa...

item.title: Biden heading back to U.S. from Angola after highlighting American investments
item.description: President Biden has wrapped up his historic trip to Angola after touring a port on Wednesday where the U.S. has invested billions. CBS News White Hous...
